cause.description:
After years of oppression and attacks by the Khartoum regime, the people of Duk Payuel Sudan still needed to walk 75 miles to see a doctor and children continued dying of curable diseases.

Thanks to the generosity of supporters around the world, a clinic was built and opened in May 2007.

Now we need to hire additional medical staff and send supplies; will you please help us raise the money to make this possible?

Read more at http://www.directchange.org/ 1. The people of Sudan deserve modern health care. 2. Through supporting small effective projects your donation goes further.
cause.mission: Bringing Health Care to Southern Sudan
cause.name: Sudan Health Care
